title: Flipkart
description: Flipkart, a leading e-commerce platform in India, is recognized for its vibrant brand colors. The shades of '1F74BA', a deep blue, 'F8D706', a bright yellow, and 'F09120', a lively orange, are distinctly associated with its identity. These colors symbolize trust, optimism, and energy, and are prominently used across its website and promotional materials.
